title: iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT) Stock Position Increased by Copperleaf Capital LLC
description: Copperleaf Capital LLC lifted its holdings in shares of iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT - Free Report) by 146.0% during the fourth quarter, according to its most recent 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
